alert.note: Alert for Austin; Fort Bend; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 28 at 2:57AM CDT until March 28 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Austin County in southeastern Texas... Northwestern Fort Bend County in southeastern Texas... Southern Waller County in southeastern Texas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 256 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Simonton, or 8 miles southwest of Brookshire, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rosenberg, Richmond, Wallis, Fulshear, Simonton, Orchard, Weston Lakes, Cumings and Cinco Ranch. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
